评论详情: Amazed by the quality!! The material is buttery soft, stretchy and not see-thru. I order my normal size and they fit me perfect!! Really love the runched design on the butt, it separate the cheeks invisibly and make it pop and the runch just feels like the GYMSHARK WHITNEY leggings!! Best fall fashion in 2022!!

Love this set! Comfortable, pretty colors. I do Ashtanga which is pretty vigorous & this works well. Soft, not sheer, and the fit is pretty accurate. I'm 5'2&1/2 & weigh 130 lbs. It's comfortable & I like my fitness clothes fairly snug, or it just gets in the way.  Don't really care about the butt ruching 😂 , but it doesn't bother me. Reasonable price. 💙

评论概述: Great material, but if you’re in between sizes it’s a strange fit
评论详情: Fabric is really amazing & buttery soft. On a scale from soft and not buttery (1) at sweatpants level and buttery & soft 10 at LuLu Lemon level, these are between 8-9.  The cut is super cute in the shirt. I bought both these in medium and small to test out and I’m still not 100% happy with the bottoms. For the smalls, the butt scrunch looked great - not baggy and not noticeable - looked real. However the smalls were a little too snug for my liking - like if I wore them too long sitting I might get a belly ache from them. However they fit well everywhere else and the butt looked the best.  For the mediums the fit in the stomach felt great - like there was room to breathe and grow, and it didn’t hurt or feel uncomfortable when sitting. However, the butt scrunch looked like a TOTAL joke 😅 way too baggy, super noticeable, and not something I’d feel comfortable wearing out.  If I could get the waist size in the medium, with the booty of the small, then these would be perfect. Alas, I ended up keeping the small (hoping that as I get more fit in the mid section they feel better) because they were the ones I’d feel most comfortable leaving the house in, look wise.  Hope this helps anyone looking. If you’re in between sizes, buy both and rerun the one you don’t need. It’s too much of a guessing game with the fit of the fabric.
This is the perfect athletic set. Extremely flattering and flexible! Great for the fitness freaks and athleisure babes. The material is insanely soft and durable.

I’m 5’9, 130lb. I ordered a large because I don’t like when things are too tight to feel good in, and a lot of the workout sets i order off amazon are more like Chinese sizes than American. Normally when I order workout clothes on amazon the larges surprisingly fit even though I’m not an over weight person. This one though was just way too big. The sleeves on the arms flared out because of how big it was and it was super loose on my torso…which typically I don’t even mind. What really bothered me was how short the actual top was…it fit more like a bra than a shirt. I tried it on with a sports bra underneath and the top was so short that you could visibly see my bra underneath. Sizes/proportions of the top are just really odd. Large bottoms were big too as the crotch was super baggy and gave me bad camel toe but it seemed like it would’ve done that even with the medium for the proportions again are just weirdly made. Honest review.

I’m really happy with this set for many of reasons. Light weight material that is buttery soft! Form fitting and flattering without being too tight or feeling squished. I have long legs (I’m 5’7) and thicker thighs (around 165 pounds) and Ive always had a problem with biker shorts riding up or just squeezing my thighs where the short ends. I got a LARGE. These don’t do that! The butt scrunch isn’t too much either to where it just feels like a wedgy lol (I’m not a fan of butt scrunch bottoms) Now up top, I’m quite flat so I was worried the large top would look baggy but it doesn’t. But it’s not too tight either. To me it’s perfect, but I believe would be tight on someone who’s more blessed with a bigger chest! Will be ordering in other colors!
This keeps coming with only a shirt! I have reordered 2x and the shorts are never in the bag!

Nice, quality set. The scrunch doesn’t scrunch must in the butt area though. Ordered a XS, 5’, 117 Lbs, snug fit but still comfortable. Will order again but a size small. Not see through, can use for working out. The V cut isn’t as noticeable as the picture but comes out to be a nice, small detail.

Very nice work out set! I ordered the long and short set in the grey because sometimes I like to wear the long pants with the short sleeve shirt. I'm 5'2 126 lbs and I am wearing a small in the pictures. I also ordered the black in a medium because I feel like the small is kind of tight but the medium is too big on me. The medium fits better at first but stretches out during my work out. The top in the medium is also very loose on the bottom band. I posted pics in different lighting so you guys can see what the color really looks like. The locker room pic is the most accurate for the color because I am using ring light for the others. My only complaint is that the arm holes are tight but I have big arms so that might be a personal problem lol.
Not front seem and perfect length. I’m 5’6

I like that these are very high waisted. Also, I have very wide hips and a very small waist so they fit that curvy body shape well. The waist on the leggings is very tight, which I like, so the leggings don't fall down. If you have a straighter shape then they may feel too tight at the waist. The color is nice, too. The only thing I don't like is that although they are not see-through, they do show the pantyline really easily, even if you wear super thin synthetic underwear that supposedly never shows a pantyline. The only underwear you can really wear with these is a thong.

I measured from my navel 40” and 51 “ hips/buttocks my thighs are 31” Good for gym workout outs but if you sweat heavily it does seep through I never sweated through clothes before but this material is thinner than anything  I’ve bought before. Nice soft to touch and and so far not weirdly not  see through. I’ve tested pants with no underwear and everyone said they don’t see anything. Don’t use pants for running it’s slips down better use for  gym and yoga only.  The shirt is nice feels not tight for me but my arms measure at 13.75” .

The color is off, hard to tell in pictures but the Chocolate color looks more faded like a burgundy and comes off purplish. This didn't bother me. What did kind of bother me was that it fits snugger than I thought and I had already sized up. Maybe I'm just bigger than I think I am and that's okay cos I plan to lose weight. I guess the real downside is there's no pockets at all. Other than that I think it would be a super flattering fit if I had a different body shape.

评论用户: Do not buy this. VERY CHEAP MATERIAL. DOES NOT LOOK LIKE THE PICTURE AT ALL
评论概述: So cute..but I got the wrong size
评论详情: I really liked this outfit.. I got an extra large  because of the top part..I was surprised by the fabric. It's not like other sets. It's not stretchy so I unusually get a med to large.  I went up 2x because I of my cup size.. the pants were to big..im sending it back only because it does not fit me .. but it's cute and if you get the rt size then you will love it..

评论概述: First one had color issue, replacement perfect
评论详情: The first pair I got in black had what looked like a seam in the front but was actually just to much dye in a line down the middle. Replacement pair was perfect and the girlfriend has found her new favorite. She said it stayed in place in the gym no ride up and the 3 tier waste band was terrific. Going to have to try a few more colors for sure! Thanks for this great product even if the first one was a miss.
These are really cute and comfortable! The scrunch part on the booty could use a little work but that’s my only critique really. Not see through in the dark red color

Cute set, I thought this would be like a cotton lounge material but this is a good quality athletic moisture wicking material. Would recommend sizing up - overall a little small. Personally don't understand the elastic booty seam. I feel like it's unnecessary.
Not sure about the material, also adversis a butt scrunch but there barely one and it is too high

This set is cute and flattering! Very stretchy and true to size forsure, I sized you since I don’t like my leggings digging in at all but I could have gotten true to size. The only reason I would give 4/5 is that after the third where they developed little balls on the leggings, other than that, very good quality

The set it’s super nice. The only thing it’s that the shirt was a little bit tight for me because I have more bread and I think I would be like large on the top and medium at the bottom. But it’s comes all same size that you order. Like if you want large top and medium bottom you can’t. So it’s the only downfall. Other that that I love it.

Overall good for the price . Good quality , squatproof and nice fit. I knocked off one star because it was too tight at the top waist are which caused it to roll down ( Im a true small , medium would’ve been too loose waist down)
I love the material of this set. The only negative thing I can say is that it’s not thick, so I feel kind of iffy squatting in the leggings. I have the black and blue set.
Love this set. The color is a little of from the picture but super soft material and comfortable

I bought the Halara pet hair resistant leggings after all the ads awhile ago. Lots of pilling on high friction areas and they slide down so I’m constantly pulling them up. These ones do not slide, the quality is better, they deflect pet hair, and they have the little rouching detail on the butt. Only downside is no pockets but that’s ok. Would recommend!!
I ordered the long sleeve set in chocolate. It is more of a purple than a chocolate color but overall the quality and fit are really nice. Will be ordering other colors
I loved this and the color was excellent! I am how ever a smaller women so the pants didn’t fit the way I wanted but I’m in love with the top!

i got the green color and loved the fit/feel of the material but girllllll every drop of sweat was shown through this thing lmao. will probably still wear as lounge wear for errands and stuff but definitely not the gym again
I got a medium but it was a little big! It’s very stretchy!

This set is sooo flattering and the material is so soft, stretchy, and comfortable!! Only negative thing I have to say is the top is not supportive of boobs at all, and my nips show through it haha so I will have to wear a sports bra under it. Other than that it’s amazing & I love the color!
Nice material. Size down for the top, the waist part was a little loose and left like it would pop up during a workout.
Short top rolls down and short legs roll up during exercise. Fits snug, stretchy and comfortable. Thin fabric kept me cool.
Love this set- top is just a little shorter then expected
It looks amazing!
Definitely true to size . Bought it in two colors :)
Loved the leggings. Thick breathable material and has a great waist band. It is not too tight to where it gives a muffin top. At a perfect measure. I got a small.

I wasn't sure in between a S and  M but the medium was loose fitting around where my shoulders meet my arms as well as the shirt hem around the bust was looser. It’s true to size so if you aren’t sure I would go down to the smaller size. I have this in 4 colors now. So cute!!!
Silky soft feeling, good stretch, beautiful color, fit as expected, squat proof.

评论概述: I’m getting it in every color.
评论详情: The quality is fantastic. I am usually a Small but I hate when my waist sits overs the band so for comfort reasons I got a M and it was perfect. I might get a small next time just to see the difference but I can’t say enough good things about this set and for the price!!

Love this set! Material is thick and super soft. I was afraid with the softness it wouldnt be like compression leggings and show imperfections, but it is very flattering, also flattering waist band shape.  I'm an former bodybuilder and these pass the true gym test and the cute test!
Looks really really nice! No tint of green or anything just a dark brown! Little darker than the picture, I thought they were black before I took them out of the package but they’re so pretty!

this workout 2 piece is great in quality, color & very flattering but the fit is so weird. i tried both the small & medium, the bottoms were fine in both but the top was uncomfortable & odd fitting. I am 5'2 128lbs

So I bought the chocolate in a medium as they were out of large and the coffee in a large to see which would fit better. The coffee (L) was extremely tight and uncomfortable but the chocolate (m) was amazing and fit great and was squat proof!

I have many, many leggings and these are my favorite. Very comfortable, fit perfectly, the high waist is not too high to the point where it’s uncomfortable. The scrunch butt is very subtle. I love these so much that I bought 2 more pairs
Honestly such a good fit and quality. It’s very flattering and has a buttery texture. Feels more high end than most Amazon work out sets! Fits true to size

I love this! it fits so well, although I am a little bit more on the petite side with small shoulders and smaller chest so maybe size up if you don’t have those features! Haven’t lifted in it yet but it’s a dark enough color that it should be good!

Super soft & comfy but the large fit more like a medium. I could’ve sized up. I’ll still wear them bc I don’t mind them being a little snug. Very short on me. Might have something to do with being a bit small though. If I buy another set I’ll be sizing up.

评论概述: most perfect shirt/short gym set ever!
评论详情: this is the most comfortable and flattering gym set i’ve ever bought!!! it’s so cute and i’m definitely gonna get this in every color. there’s also a small pocket in the back which is handy for airpods or chapstick while at the gym.

评论概述: Don't order the greyish white, bc it's white!
评论详情: The greyish white was represented so nicely in the photos, but it is completely off! It's white as snow! Sadly disappointed bc that was my fave color out of all the selections. It is buttery soft though. Just be aware the colors may be off!  Also looking at the new set closely, it has some stains... So it's been worn! Eew! I'm going to give it one more try & re-order in another color. Hoping for a better experience. If it is I'll update my review!

I’m 5’4 135lbs and ordered a size S. Absolutely shocked by this set! Comparable to Aerie and LuLu quality for half the price. Both top and bottom are buttery smooth, stretchy and just overall amazing!
Super comfy, pops booty out, squat proof & material quality is great ! & I’m 4’11 & 194 pounds but I fit MEDIUM. Keeps it tight & Right !
I’m 5ft 125lbs petite frame. I got a size small and it fit really nice. The color was as pictured and the material was butter skin smooth. Not cheap or see through. Definitely give a snatched look.
Super comfortable, light weight, true to color & size. Only weird thing is the armpit size but honestly doesn’t bother me much at all. I absolutely love this set.

评论概述: It’s nice but not for the price, leggings fall down from your waist when working out
评论详情: It’s nice but not for the price, leggings fall down from your waist when working out
This set is perfect it’s soft and buttery smooths out all of your imperfections highly recommend it’s so comfortable
I am absolutely in love with this workout set. And the color is amazing! The fabric is soft and breathable. 10/10!
This workout set is perfect! It’s super flattering and breathable! Fits as expected too. I got a medium and am 5’2” and 135 pounds.
Super adorable and high quality active wear set. Material seems great for sweating and the set is very flattering! I ordered and XS. Definitely recommend!
I ended up purchasing a second pair because of how soft the material is!! It's super smooth on my skin and feels so good working out in this set
Very comfortable and cute active set. Fits my body like a glove. Ordered 3 different colors, and I’ll probably end up getting all. Love how I look in this set
Amazing fit and colour. Size normal I am S/M and it fits like M
This is the best workout set that I’ve ever gotten so soft fits my short legs and makes everything look nice and snatched

This looks really cute for hanging around the house or light exercise or stretching but I would NOT do lifting or cardio in this! The material rolls eith movement (leggings down, top rolls up) and it doesn't wick sweat. After 30 minutes on the stairmaster, all the sweat gathered in my crotch and it looked like I peed my pants! Will keep for around the house, but not the gym.
It's butter soft. The scrunch isn't too much and you can mix and match the set with other clothes.
Fit really great! I was surprised how great the material is too! Going to order more in various colors.

评论概述: Cute but not for working out
评论详情: Cute for a look going to brunch or lunch with girlfriends. The fabric isn’t great for working out. It shows the sweat almost instantly and the top is to short to do cardio in. The top and bottoms have zero compression so you see everything. Cute for a two hour brunch or lunch. But definitely Not for working out.
I got size M, I’m 5ft weigh 126lb & it fit perfect! Not see through and doesn’t feel cheap. Bought the black one first and came back for more(:
These are the best! I love the material and how it feels. Thick material and waist band does not fold. Squat Proof :)
So stylish comfy and stretchy! Loveeeeee

Loved the material, loved the color, stretch proof and all…but the top does not fit very comfortably to hold you all in. I felt like my chest was going to fall out if I actually worked out in it, maybe as just a cute set to wear around the house, but active wear, not so much.
Fits great amazing to work out in!
best amazon set i ever got, looks so flattering. Will definitely get other colors of this set
Literally such a good dupe, I’m obsessed and have 4 pairs, size small
The top in medium fits great but the bottoms were too big, you should be able to choose different sizes for tops and bottom not everyone is built the same.
I’m 160lbs and 5’4. Love love love :)

评论概述: Buttery soft and moves with you!
评论详情: I really liked the rust colored set. The color is as vibrant as photos, and it is a really body conforming fabric that doesn't feel too tight. This set is great for movement and working out (I wore it for a mud run and it held up very well!) Soft to the touch and body hugging. In the best ways!

评论概述: Very comfortable, great for work out but a little see through so probably not gym appropriate
评论详情: So I actually really loved these because of how freaking comfortable they are and also how they did not ride down or up and they stayed put when I was working out. They were a little long on me but I'm 4'11 so I mean that's to be expected. The only issue is they are see through when you bend over so I would definitely not wear these around town or to the gym. The fabric is thick in some areas and it does have the scrunch at the booty so it makes it pop. I wish it had more thickness at the tummy to help hold more of that in but for the price i would say these are a slam dunk purchase.
Got these for a cosplay didn't end up using them. But they looked great. And they're very thick!!

评论概述: True to size but NO back scrunch on bottoms
评论详情: True to size, top is super cute, set is comfortable and material is soft and stretchy. However, not sure if mine was just defective, odd sticking in the back of the bottoms. There's no back bottom scrunch as listed in description either. Sadly, this could've been a 5 star workout set.

评论概述: Smooth & definitely like a second skin!
评论详情: This set definitely fits as a second skin. The material is buttery smooth and the color is true to the listing photos. I'm about 165lbs and 5'7, and so I usually order a size large with things like this, but this set fit me almost comedically small. I'm tall at 5'7 but it looked like there was not enough fabric to cover my body, as if it was a kids set. So I would highly suggest sizing up! Also, there's no way to wear any underwear with this set. You can see underwear outlines on the bottom and nipple outlines through the top. I would personally only wear this primarily at home!
Super cute set! I feel like it runs on the smaller side.  If I wear a bra, the top wouldn’t fit. If I ordered a size up, it would be perfect. Otherwise, still great for wearing around the house.
The outfit is super cute. I think I should’ve ordered an xtra small as I ordered a small. My hip/waist ratio causes the outfit to be baggy on me in my midsection. I would order a size down.

I love love love the color- it’s much better in person than in the picture. The material is very stretchy and comfortable. I’ve worn this set several times now- full body workouts, squats, etc; and I’ve never had an issue. I can do a full range of motions without any concern of the material ripping.  Overall a very nice set for the price!
I wish I would have sized up this is kind of small

These leggings were nice but they fit very snug. I had to fight to pull them up, but they do fit. The material is different than athletic leggings so they are more of an everyday legging than your average gym legging. The scrunch is a nice effect and doesn’t overdo it.

They fit pretty comfortably, I’m 5’7 and 151 lbs. I got a medium, next time I will probably size up but these are still good. Just want a little bit more room around my waist. Also, these are not as high waisted as I thought but still like them ! Will be ordering more

These leggings feel great! They’re thick and warm, also seem almost lint repellent which is a bonus.. I only gave 4 stars bc it’s definitely not squat proof. I wore these to work (I’m a waitress) and while they looked non-see through at home under brighter light you could definitely see a bit of my underwear. Otherwise great lounge leggings!

Even though the fabric is reminiscent of swim suit fabric and comfy, the shorts are shorter than I expected them to be. The top fits like a sports bra with sleeves. I don't think that I'll ever wear this outfit outside, but it's a decent indoor exercise outfit. I don't hate this set, but I don't love it.
